page.title: 01Asfordby -1985 by Ian Aitken
page.content: Asfordby is a large village.In Asfordby there is a cricket pitch,3 football pitches,a quarry,a river,a canal,a warehouse and a plant nursery.There are three main roads-Saxelby Road,Loughborough Road and Station Lane.Loughborough Road becomes Main Street in the village.There is a church.There are two hairdressers shops,newsagents and post office,butchers shop,Chinese take-away restaurant,fish and chip shop,Do-it-Yourself and hardware shop,a supermarket,a greengrocers shop,a chemists shop,a radio and T.V.shop and a betting shop.There is a primary school,a community centre and three public houses.There is a gravel pit,a lock gate on the canal,three substations,a petrol filling station,a lake,and lots of houses and bungalows. It has not got a sports complex.
